word: G4625 - σκάνδαλον - skándalon - skan'-dal-on - Occasion to fall

sections.paragraph: tricker ("trigger") trap - stick; a trap, snare
Part(s) of speech: Noun Neuter / பெயர்ச்சொல் (அஃறிணை)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A “scandal”; probably from a derivative of G2578; a trap stick (bent sapling), that is, snare (figuratively cause of displeasure or sin): - occasion to fall (of stumbling), offence, thing that offends, stumbling-block.
Cognate: G4624, G4625
